prompts: Create a graceful water-type Pokemon that resembles a swan and has elegant blue accents.
Imagine a flying Pokemon with a sleek white body and vibrant aqua features, perfect for soaring through the skies.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies beauty and tranquility, with a feathered appearance and a serene expression.
Design a majestic bird Pokemon with a long neck, white plumage, and stunning blue chest markings.
Generate a Pokemon that represents the essence of water habitats, combining elegance with aquatic charm.
Make an enchanting creature that has a swan-like form, showcasing a blend of white and blue colors.
Give me an image of a Pokemon that looks like a waterfowl, ideal for living in wetlands.
